scripts.lint: npm run lint:back ; npm run lint:front ; echo 'Do `npm run format`, if needed'
scripts.format: npm run format:back ; npm run format:front
scripts.cleanup: npm run cleanup:stop && npm run cleanup:containers && npm run cleanup:images && npm run cleanup:volumes && npm run cleanup:network
scripts.prisma:studio: docker exec -it backend npx prisma studio
scripts.prisma:migrate: docker exec -it backend npx prisma migrate dev
